channel.title: 8bit on The 8-bit Zine
channel.description: Recent content in 8bit on The 8-bit Zine

item.title: Overthrown - action game for Commodore VIC-20
item.description: Palace situation turns grim crowds chant “go away” If I were a dictator, I would take everything valuable and run away. This is exactly what you need to do in the game Overthrown for the Commodore VIC-20. Some of us remember the times when eight-bit computers were every teenager’s dream. Slightly younger ones may remember the classic versions of GTA games, those with simple graphics and a top-down view. Later, 3D graphics almost completely dominated the gaming world.
